items.title: Trump to AI Companies: Want Federal Funds? Your Chatbot Can't Be 'Woke'
items.summary: Trump warns AI companies that in order to receive federal funds, their chatbots must not promote 'woke' messaging. Companies like Anthropic, Google, OpenAI, and xAI could lose up to $200 million in Defense Department contracts if they do not comply.
